'''1.6.4 Build 2''' is the second build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.6.4, released in October 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.6.4]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
* Sound effects.{{info needed|what sound effects exactly?}}
* Launcher: All other GUIs close when opening a GUI. Button pressed also gets bold text.
* Students can't use lava buckets if fire/TNT is disabled.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Chat message sender being rendered twice.
